Instruction: Peel and cube potatoes. Boil until tender, then drain and mash with butter, milk, eggs, salt, and pepper.
Cut salmon and cod into bite-sized pieces.
Cook shrimp until pink and opaque.
Melt butter in a pan, add flour, cook for a minute, then gradually whisk in fish stock and milk.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until thickened.
Stir in half-and-half, parsley, and cooked seafood.
Pour the seafood mixture into a baking dish.
Top with mashed potatoes and sprinkle with cheddar cheese.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until golden and bubbly.
